commands.name: publish
commands.summary: publishes the current project as a package to the registry

commands.name: install

options.name: [<package> [<version>]]
options.summary: package name with specified url or version

options.name: [--registry]
options.summary: will publish the package to the ethpm registry (you need to be on a ropsten chain for this)

commands.summary: install a package from dapphub or any other source
